title: Addy's Surprise: A Christmas Story
description: During the holiday season, Addy and Momma are generous with their meager savings and thrilled by a wonderful surprise.' to 'Addy Walker is a proud, courageous girl growing up in 1864, during the midst of the Civil War. Addy's stories tell of her daring escape with her mother from slavery, and the challenges they face afterward as they try to reunite their family. But Addy's stories are about much more than hardship. They are full of the love and hope that help her get through the worst of times and keep her dreams alive During the holiday season, Addy and Momma are generous with their meager savings and thrilled by a wonderful surprise.
author: Connie Rose Porter
